__TOC__

For installing Gutsy Tribe 2 on rev1 MBP, see the following helpful blog posts by Matt Galvin:

http://www.simplifiedcomplexity.com/blog/mgalvin/gutsy-tribe-2-on-macbook-pro-testing

http://www.simplifiedcomplexity.com/blog/mgalvin/ubuntu-gutsy-macbook-pro-ati-fglrx-compiz-fusion-working-you-ask-yes
